mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id boardId, b.board_title boardTitle, b.board_content boardContent, b.staff_id staffId, b.insert_date insertDate, s.username username FROM board b INNER JOIN staff s ON b.staff_id = s.staff_id WHERE board_id = #{boardId}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( board_pw, board_title, board_content, staff_id, insert_date )VALUES( PASSWORD(#{boardPw}), #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{staffId}, NOW() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board WHERE board_id=#{boardId} AND board_pw=PASSWORD(#{boardPw})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_title=#{boardTitle}, board_content=#{boardContent} WHERE board_id=#{boardId} AND board_pw=PASSWORD(#{boardPw})
